SlaveInteractionModeDef.label: no interaction
SlaveInteractionModeDef.description: Wardens will not interact with this slave.

SlaveInteractionModeDef.label: suppress
SlaveInteractionModeDef.description: Wardens will periodically intimidate the slave to increase their suppression level and reduce the chance of rebellion.

SlaveInteractionModeDef.label: imprison
SlaveInteractionModeDef.description: A warden will imprison this slave. Once imprisoned, they can be recruited, or enslaved once again.

SlaveInteractionModeDef.label: emancipate
SlaveInteractionModeDef.description: A warden will free this slave.

SlaveInteractionModeDef.label: execute
SlaveInteractionModeDef.description: A warden will execute this slave on the spot by cutting.
